title: Our native shore
creator_credit: Ronald Stark, Andrew Rice, British Information Services and Esso Film Unit
brief_description: Shows the people whose lives and work are centred directly on the coastal areas of the British Isles and to whom the sea and ships are a part of their lives. Fisherman, coast guard, merchant seaman, life boat man, harbourmaster, shipwright, yachtsman, lighthouse keeper and a score of others move against a background rich in natural beauty and historical associations.
